attributes.action: Make offenders pay for the costs of Police, Police helicopters, &  Ambulance's,
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the light of the services of Police, and NHS costs rising, and being wasted on Young offenders, either drunk, or under the influence of drugs, or driving while banned, or disqualified,Burgulary or for what-ever reason. They should be made to foot the bill for their stupidity.These services are overstretched so tax payers shouldnt pay for them
